邁.definition: to take a step; to stride

邁克爾·傑克遜.pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Jie2 ke4 xun4
邁克爾·傑克遜.definition: Michael Jackson (1958-2009), American musician and entertainer

邁克爾·克萊頓.pinyin: Mai4 ke4 er3 · Ke4 lai2 dun4
邁克爾·克萊頓.definition: Michael Crichton (1942-), US techno-thriller writer, author of Jurassic Park

邁出.definition: to step out; to take a (first) step

邁向.definition: to stride toward (success); to march toward; to take a step toward

邁步.definition: to take a step; to step forward

邁赫迪.definition: Mahdi or Mehdi (Arabic: Guided one), redeemer of some Islamic prophesy

邁赫迪軍.definition: Mahdi army, Iraqi Shia armed militia led by Moqtada Sadr

邁進.definition: to step in; to stride forward; to forge ahead
